about1: Our story begins with art -filled designs that leave a mark on every pattern in every stitch. Our first collection consisted of pieces describing a story. The fabrics were not only clothes, but a canvas and each sewing was like a line written on this canvas.
about2: Our collections appeal to those who seek originality in the streets, parties and in every moment of life. We create works that are not only clothing products, but also part of characters. Rising wind wearing, not just an outfit, but also carry a story.
about3: Eightborn is a brand that is free, full of stories and dragging you into new adventures. Be a part of this story, because every wind has a story, and Eightborn is ready to share this story with you.
